item.title: Hurricane EXERCISE Forecast/Advisory Number 24
item.description:
Issued at 0900Z THU MAY 21 2015 
ZCZC MIATCMAT2 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE EXERCISE FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER   24
NWS NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL892015
0900 UTC THU MAY 21 2015
 
TROPICAL DEPRESSION CENTER LOCATED NEAR 28.9N  90.5W AT 21/0900Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  30 NM
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE 940 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  115 KT WITH GUSTS TO  145 KT.
64 KT...  85NE  60SE  55SW  70NW.
50 KT... 120NE  90SE  60SW 110NW.
34 KT... 225NE 190SE 150SW 190NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 28.9N 90.5W AT 21/0900Z
AT 21/0600Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 28.9N  90.5W
 
FORECAST VALID 21/2100Z 30.5N  90.3W
MAX WIND 100 KT...GUSTS  125 KT.
64 KT...  65NE  55SE  45SW  55NW.

34 KT... 210NE 175SE 120SW 150NW.

MAX WIND  50 KT...GUSTS  65 KT.
50 KT...  40NE  45SE  35SW  55NW.
34 KT... 120NE 110SE  60SW 110NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 24/0900Z 40.2N  86.7W
MAX WIND  35 KT...GUSTS 55 KT.
34 KT...  70NE  60SE  40SW  50NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 250 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 325 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 25/0900Z 44.0N  84.0W
MAX WIND 30 KT...GUSTS  45 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 26/0900Z 47.9N  84.0W

REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 23.2N  75.5W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 21/1500Z
 
FORECASTER STEWART
